projects.title: Order Entry Widget
projects.shortDesc: A custom 'order entry' widget used by internal customer service reps to streamline bulk ordering on the front-end.

projects.title: Padlock Buying Guide
projects.shortDesc: A guided selling wizard to help customers decide on which padlock is right for their needs.

projects.title: REACTed-development
projects.shortDesc: A memory game created with React.
projects.longDesc: REACTed Development is a memory game created with React. It uses components, props, and state to respond to user events. Try and click all the cards without doubling your guess!

projects.title: Dyv-iN
projects.shortDesc: A 'Yelp' mock site that utilizes MySQL database and CRUD
projects.longDesc: Every city has those places that everyone feels like they need to go, but that doesn't mean you have to! Check out Dyv-iN to get some ideas about the better places to go.

projects.title: Jurassic Park Trivia
projects.shortDesc: Trivia game using JavaScript for the logic and jQuery to manipulate HTML.

projects.title: LIRI
projects.shortDesc: A command line node app that takes in parameters and gives you back data, like siri but for the command line

projects.title: Bamazon
projects.shortDesc: A command-line-interface node application that acts like an amazon storefront
